title: trace
description: Shared trace envelope for correlating requests and receipts across agents, hops, and spans.

trace_id.description: Logical trace identifier for correlating all spans in a workflow.

span_id.description: Identifier for this specific span within the trace.

parent_span_id.description: Optional parent span identifier, if this span is a child of another.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp for when this span was created.

tags.description: Optional key-value tags for tracing and diagnostics.
